summary: Adds Recolors of Severus616's Daughter of War Armor
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://static2.nexusmods.com/110/mods/110/images/45662-1-1382886815.png[/img][/center]

[i][color=red][center]* 9 new colorvariants * Heavy and Light Armor * Alternatives without symbols * Alternative Larger Boots *[/i][/color][/center]

[line]
[b][size=4]HTB Daughter of War Armor Recolor[/b][/size]
[line]

File name: Daughter of War Recolors
Author:	EvenstarGW & Severus 616
Date: 2013/10/30
Version: 2.0

[line]

[img]http://farm4.staticflickr.com/3695/10513491495_75a1d8d88e_o.png[/img]

This mod adds 9 Recolors of the [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/45530//?]Daughter of War Armor[/url] by [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/4661369/?]Severus616[/url].

[img]http://farm6.staticflickr.com/5498/10513491875_ac555d721b_o.png[/img]

This mod contains:
- 9 colors of the Daughter of War Armor: 
* BlackSilver * BlackGold 
* Original Gold 
* RedSilver * RedGold
* BlackBlueSilver * BlackBlueGold 
* BlueBlackSilver * BlueBlackGold 
* BrownGreenSilver * BrownGreenGold
* GreenBrownSilver * GreenBrownGold

Optional files:
* No symbol on the pauldrons (note that inventory models will still have a symbol)
* Alternative necklace (taken from [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/35880/?]SC Jewelry[/url] by Severus616)
* Larger Boots

[img]http://farm4.staticflickr.com/3696/10513703933_a523104952_o.png[/img]

The Armor is Temperable and craftable under the Leather and Steel category.
The necklace is craftable under the Jewelry category.

[img]http://farm3.staticflickr.com/2811/10513704503_10370b0577_o.png[/img]

Unzip the package and dump the stuff in your data or install the BAIN archive with wrye smash/Nexus Mod Manager.

If you want to use the optional files, unzip the optionals archive and replace the optional files of your choice manually over the files in your data folder.

[img]http://farm6.staticflickr.com/5514/10513506226_eded08393e_o.png[/img]

If you installed manually, remove the following files/directories:

- Data/HTBSevDaughterOfWarArmor.esp
- Data/Meshes/Armor/Svsarmor&cloth/Daughter of war/Black
- Data/Meshes/Armor/Svsarmor&cloth/Daughter of war/Black - Gold
- Data/Meshes/Armor/Svsarmor&cloth/Daughter of war/Original - Gold
- Data/Meshes/Armor/Svsarmor&cloth/Daughter of war/Red
- Data/Meshes/Armor/Svsarmor&cloth/Daughter of war/Red - Gold
- Data/Meshes/Armor/Svsarmor&cloth/Daughter of war/BlackBlue
- Data/Meshes/Armor/Svsarmor&cloth/Daughter of war/BlackBlue - Gold
- Data/Meshes/Armor/Svsarmor&cloth/Daughter of war/BlueBlack
- Data/Meshes/Armor/Svsarmor&cloth/Daughter of war/BlueBlack - Gold
- Data/Meshes/Armor/Svsarmor&cloth/Daughter of war/BrownGreen
- Data/Meshes/Armor/Svsarmor&cloth/Daughter of war/BrownGreen - Gold
- Data/Meshes/Armor/Svsarmor&cloth/Daughter of war/GreenBrown
- Data/Meshes/Armor/Svsarmor&cloth/Daughter of war/GreenBrown - Gold
- Data/Textures/Armor/Svsarmor&cloth/Daughter of war/_GOLD.dds
- Data/Textures/Armor/Svsarmor&cloth/Daughter of war/black
- Data/Textures/Armor/Svsarmor&cloth/Daughter of war/red
- Data/Textures/Armor/Svsarmor&cloth/Daughter of war/blue
- Data/Textures/Armor/Svsarmor&cloth/Daughter of war/green

[img]http://farm8.staticflickr.com/7435/10513527834_71d970212d_o.png[/img]

none, though if you want the BrownSilver you need the original file by Severus616 too.

[img]http://farm4.staticflickr.com/3813/10513492715_5b8e8fa729_o.png[/img]

Compatible with all body replacers, it shows no skin.
Compatible with [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/9286/?]SkyRe[/url], using the [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28467//?]ReProccer[/url].

[img]http://farm4.staticflickr.com/3706/10513491205_d0cfd0932c_o.png[/img]

none as far as I know

[img]http://farm8.staticflickr.com/7316/10513508556_a930855dce_o.png[/img]

You can find me on TESNexus as 'EvenstarGW'

[img]http://farm8.staticflickr.com/7446/10513508286_69a8417496_o.png[/img]

This mod could not exist without:

- Severus616, thank you for the awesome mesh and textures
- Heaventhere, thanks for the request for the blue version
- clarity929292, thanks for the request for the green version

[img]http://farm3.staticflickr.com/2832/10513506966_c711236269_o.png[/img]

Ask Severus616 first and foremost
Ask me for usage of my textures

[img]http://farm3.staticflickr.com/2806/10513506346_b7ae3617b0_o.png[/img]
